titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that public servants should be commended for their dedication and continued service to the United States during Public Service Recognition Week, the week of May 3 through 9, 2015.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
4/30/2015--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of Public Service Recognition Week.
Commends public servants, government employees, and members of the uniformed services for their public service and honors those who have given their lives in service.
Calls upon a new generation to consider a career in public service as an honorable profession.
Encourages efforts to promote public service careers at all levels of government.
